Name: Arriving at the Marquee of the Claw
Content: As you arrive on the scene, ten Warriors of the Claw surround you and try to make you confess that you're there to steal their cattle... either that or you're an evil wizard, it's difficult to understand all their allegations.
Introduction: Toride tells you where the Marquee of the Claw should be. This is where you will have to meet the all-father, Emilio.
ResultIntroduction: You find Emilio and deliver Toride's message.

Name: The Pan of the Crown
Content: Milane needs wood and has asked you to go to Crown Hills to collect it.
Introduction: Go to the wooded area of Crown Hills to collect the requested logs.

Name: Emissaries of Eminence
Content: As soon as you arrive, the emissary begins making demands to be offered the standards of comforts he's entitled to as an official emissary of Ordval.
Introduction: You must accompany the emissary, Solgen, to the Kofo-Lun Camp
ResultConclusion:
Lily despises Solgen's extremely pretentious nature. After a few minutes of "pleasantries", you suspect Solgen will end up buried in a shallow grave in the desert.

However, it turns out you had underestimated Solgen. He manages to turn the discussion to his advantage, coming to an arrangement that satisfies Lily. You understand that he will remain in the camp for some time to negotiate with Kofo-Lun's Council of Elders. 

Your work is done. You will see later whether or not the emissary requires protection for the return trip.

Name: The Hundred Woodlands of Hunthief
Content: Gantras authorities are looking for a guide to take inventory of all the woodlands of Hunthief. The ultimate goal is to find all the nuertesilicio groves.

Name: The exchange of minoris runes
Content: Rhavina holds small auctions where she trades runes with visitors. For you, it's a good way to improve the runic enchantments of your companions.
Hint: This daily scenario is for your companions' enchantments.

Name: The Rite of the Trogulnus
Content: A climbing course marked by tortolions teeth climbs to the top of the huge boulder.

Name: Working with Palenne
Content: You work with Palenne on the study of ruins. The place is really of little interest... excluding at night when the army of darkness appears. The mission seems to be more about fulfilling a mutual desire to learn more about a potential ally.
ResultConclusion:
The Kildos Ruins hold few clues and fewer answers. However, you learn that Palenne is searching for an ancient ruin which seems to be tied to the vanishing Veil of Mists.

This place, named Antarkos, would have resurfaced from the ancient texts of Roic, as if for hundreds of years all Roic's followers had ignored it.

Name: Scabonzi Outpost
Introduction: The scabonzis are building a forward-operating outpost. The military could handle it. Then again, you could too if you feel like it.

Name: Back to the Grandmoons' Home
Content: You, Atora, and Matteus must now put an end to the undead's attacks. But first, you should think of the best way to do it.
ResultConclusion: The evil spell has been destroyed by your actions. Atora and Matteus thank you for your help and assure you that they will support you if necessary on your next adventures. They don't question your work, but you can tell they regret failing to learn the identity of the nobleman who cursed them so.

Name: Hydram Purification
Content: The number of creatures linked to the water element must be reduced in the caverns.

Name: The Great Garden of the Circle
Content: The gardeners of the sanctuary need plants from all over Ordval for their garden.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: The Hiding-Place
Content: A follower of the Hippogriff is setting up a hiding place to spy on the Arcanists activities.

Name: Improving your Domain
Content: Leonidas advises you on a number of lessons you must learn so that you can improve your home. Talk with him for more details.

Name: A Rune Expert
Content:
A woman in her forties, presumably Rhavina, sits in the shade of a wooden porch attentively studying what appears to be an ancient book.

It's only when you're a few feet away from her that Rhavina realizes you're there. She jumps a little in surprise, then regains her composure and gives you a benevolent smile.
Introduction: Go find Rhavina and ask her for help with the runic lock.

Name: A Guide to the Guilds
Content: You help Rhavina choose which guild she should visit next to offer one of her runic seminars.

Name: A Lost Chest
Content: You have found a lost chest.

Name: A distant corrupted memory, Volume 7
Content: The runes invoke a memory that you must face alone.

Name: Seashells on the Seashore
Content: A citizen of Quara is looking for seashells for her collection. Particularly those found to the south along the beach.

Name: Gildiro II Recipient Gem
Content: Gildiro Resonardo Need Gem. Resonance Experiment A346 Version 5 Post Regulation.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: Flying Debris
Content:
It is difficult to imagine how wooden debris got stuck in the middle of a sizeable cliff. However it got up there, you have only one choice if you wish to retrieve it. 

It's time to climb.

Name: Survival Aid
Content: After listening to Eugenie Filouderien's sad story, you must decide on the best help to give her without knowing if she told you the whole truth.

Name: Intuition
Content: Upon arrival, you notice a mysterious figure nearby, cloaked in the shadows of a throne-shaped hill. He appears to be watching you. It would probably be wiser to step forward and introduce yourself before he becomes hostile.
Introduction: A strange structure located nearby catches your attention.
ResultConclusion: The figure concealed in the shadows turns towards you. You see a wizened man of great age whose wrinkled face tells the story of a life well lived. He greets you with a smile.

Name: Parcels for Quara
Content: Bolondinus is waiting for his favourite food at Quara Market.
Introduction: Bolondinus is at Quara Market.

Name: Advice from the Celestial Tree
Content: The celestial tree gives you the gift of training to help you in your adventures.
Introduction: You understand that you have been invited to the big tree.
ResultConclusion:
Once the work is done, a passage opens in the roots of the large tree.

You feel like the tree wanted something from you.

Name: Chrono-golems
Content: Defeat the golems using the wind evocation you learned.
Introduction: Yolasula told you that the chrono-golems headed east from her abode.
ResultConclusion: You have successfully defeated the chrono-golem! Return to Yolasula.

Name: The Four Tops
Content: Hammer Relay employees want four deer leather jackets with chinvre lining and Laidor buckles.

Name: The Search of the Sleeping
Content: On the ground near the plinth, you discover a plaque upon which a message is written: "At the foot of an eye observing the feast."

Name: Message for the Rose
Content: You have agreed to carry an emergency message to the Protectors of the Rose. The magic in the missive prevents you from using portals.
Introduction: You have agreed to carry an emergency message to the Protectors of the Rose.
ResultConclusion: The content of the missive seems to have alerted the Protectors to the danger. The Gantras authorities have also been notified as a few nuertesilicio trees are growing in the area.

Name: Swamp Stones
Content: A merchant is carrying a heavy load of green stones. Maybe, with a little persuasion, he would sell you a few.

Name: Ambush of the Selfish
Content: Your gut tells you that something is about to happen. You have to make a decision quickly.

Name: Ovie and the Nobles
Content: Cedric was waiting for your arrival, he was probably warned by Celeste.
Introduction: You must find a certain Cedric Duverger who would be installed in the forest of the same name.
ResultConclusion: Cdric listens to your story then leaves for the manor asking you to wait for him. He returns a few minutes later with a scarf.

Name: The Recruits' Armoury
Content: Being well-armoured is a priority for the Protectors of the Rose. The armoury always needs new gear for recruits.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: Pirate Island?
Content: You step off the ferryboat onto the isle, but see no trace of a pirate lair. To make matters worse, you discover the hard way that your ferry has no plans to wait for you - stranding you on the island.
Introduction: Fabien finally gives in, revealing that the pirates have a secret dock on a small island in the Gulf of Enorwen.
ResultIntroduction:
There are many pirates patrolling the island. You suspect that their true lair is well-hidden somewhere in the island's forest, though you cannot find the exact location. 

You will have to try a new strategy

Name: A Simple Formality
Content: You have to fill out a form and answer a few questions, then you can enter Gantras.
ResultIntroduction: Following this trialling adventure, the guards ignore you completely. You assume that you can now enter and exit the city freely.

Name: Colour for a Sap
Content: Here is the sap of the day.
Hint: This daily quest has no success limit. This daily quest will give you access to other quests depending on your number of successes.

Name: The Witch's Property
Content: The men who watched Leighanna are still prowling around the mansion. You will have to work in secret.
Introduction: You need to go to Diadem Manor to collect Leighanna's gear and study her facilities.
ResultConclusion:
You managed to recover Leighanna's equipment and study how it was installed.

You think you can build her a building that meets her needs in your domain.

Name: The lone druidess
Content: A solitary druidess lives alone, as the title demands, in the solitary woods. She asks you for a series of plants to make a new perfume.
ResultConclusion: In a burst of generosity, the druidess gives you a sample of her perfume.

Name: A Lost Chest
Content: You have found a lost chest.

Name: Savage Boar Meat for the Inn
Content: The Hydra Inn in the town of Quara offered you work procuring boar meat so that they could prepare their specialty dishes.
Introduction: Savage boars live in the plain around Quara.

Name: Palvable and Grusson
Content: Saraya needs rare materials for a secret project. She will offer you training in a secret technique in exchange. They really are a secretive bunch.

Name: Creature Comforts
Content: Athuso has asked you to remove a creature that has taken up residence in the attic of his building. The only way to take care of it is to go up there.
ResultConclusion: The pair of panthers were making their den in the attic of the warehouse. After a clash like that, they will seek out a new home.

Name: The Hard Way
Content:
You must defeat a good number of the creatures of the ruins on the Hammery Plain on behalf of the Circle of the Great Tree.

Your objective is to find out whether destroying these creatures affects the maleficent aura of the region.
Introduction: You must defeat a good number of the creatures of the ruins on the Hammery Plain on behalf of the Circle of the Great Tree.

Name: Powerful Serums for Marital Purposes
Content: The Thanasisson family still requires the assistance of local herbalists to help create powerful serums to speed up wedding preparations.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: A Mistpiercer
Content: You have found a Mistpiercer, a machine capable of sowing chaos if misused. To destroy it, you will need to first face its guardians.

Name: "Not all that glimmers is gold..."
Content: You spot a golden glimmer. Something must have fallen off the cliff, can you find it?

Name: The Architectroll
Content: You promised Toride that you would get rid of the troll leader. He is said to reside in his lair, near the mine's lake.
ResultConclusion:
Toride seems impressed with your achievement.

She informs you that she will invite you on a future exploration as soon as the passage to the Peak of Fear is found.

Name: Exterminate the trogulnus
Content: Around a campfire sit three trogulnus and two... Norgarrs?
Introduction: Carl asked you to kill the trogulnus in Bulgrof Forest. If the Passage of the Brave is too difficult for you, you can go by boat from World's End Relay.
ResultConclusion: Why would norgarrs fight alongside trogulnus? As you wonder this, one of the trogulnus gets up and flees northeast. You must catch up!

Name: [D]Get Ready for the Vortex
Content: [D]With the help of Leonidas, you prepare to activate your first vortex. You can chat with him to know more about what you have to do.

Name: Lost Property
Content: You have the strangest feeling that there is something of note nearby.

Name: Maintenance of the Caravanserai
Content: Friends and guild members are asked to provide building maintenance materials. Residents will reward you with items of their creation.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: "Behold! The Summit of Predatoris!"
Content: A druid of the Circle has set up camp well behind a rock. He is trying in vain to build a device that could spy on the top of Mount Predatoris. He claims to want to discover the fauna that inhabits it. Could you help him?
ResultConclusion:
With the druid, you look into the device to discover a ship-sized owl-like creature nesting upon the mountain summit. 

No other fauna would make its home near such a monster.

Name: Deep Sleep
Content:
A contact of Sir Tarul Verdant confirmed to Celeste Kortombe that the nightmares were likely caused by a powerful spell. In order to end it, you must find a mysterious object that has surely been concealed in the village by the spellcaster. 

How do you plan to find it?
ResultConclusion: Celeste takes the medallion and puts it in a wooden box, then she thanks you warmly.

Name: The Broken Enigma
Content: A broken wooden sculpture looks like it was once a puzzle that would have conveniently unlocked treasure. Seeing as it is broken, the next most sensible solution appears to be destroying it layer by layer until you find the loot.

Name: Sahranna's Narcotics
Content: Sahranna explains to you that she mixes narcotics to make a substance which allows her to enter a trance. Though on many occasions, she lacks the requisite ingredients. And this is one of those times.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: The Bitter Guard
Content: You have to find a way to stop the bad behavior of the guard without making the situation worse.
ResultConclusion: You are not sure that your measures will suppress the guard's petty vendetta for long. But at least you have tried and can now sleep peacefully for a few nights.

Name: The Sand Enigma
Content: Strange symbols on the floor lead you to believe you have found an ancient puzzle.
ResultConclusion: After solving the puzzle, a pillar appears with two ingots of a metal which remain cool to the touch despite the oppressive heat.

Name: The secret gardens
Content: Shrine gardeners need rare plants for the Druid section of their garden.
Hint: This daily quest can be completed 25 times.

Name: Sylph's Mixtures, Volume 3
Content: You work with Sylph to create a Sylphian mixture to help her against crystals corruption.

Name: I Come in Peace
Content: Having arrived on site, a pack of sandvargrs block your access to the residence, growling all the while. On a balcony, you see the silhouette of a broad-shouldered man. You imagine that it would only take a word from him to disperse his pack, but he seems unwilling. You should look for a way to impress him so that you can approach without a bloodbath.
Introduction: You follow Galena's instructions and discover the location of Vorf's house.
ResultConclusion: You have gathered a large enough force. Vorf nods towards his pack, and they disperse, letting you pass.

Name: The Verdant Conspiracy
Content: During your discussion with Myrtille, you came to the conclusion that it was important to know more about Tarul Verdants motivations. You must now choose the best way to get information.
ResultConclusion: After telling Myrtille about your discoveries, she seems to be disappointed. On the one hand, she is delighted that Tarul Verdant does not hide a heavy secret, but your research has not made it possible to understand the reasons which prevent the knight from looking for the witch.

Name: A Mistpiercer
Content: You have found a Mistpiercer, a machine capable of sowing chaos if misused. To destroy it, you will need to first face its guardians.

Name: The aggressive Norgarrs
Content: Some Norgarrs are sitting around a campfire. When they see you, they take their weapons and approach menacingly.

Name: Gem Recipient Gildiro III
Content: Gildiro Resonardo Need Gem. Resonance Experience A348 Version 7 Post Regulation.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: A Lost Chest
Content: You have found a lost chest. However, it is guarded by a creature. You will need to fight it first.

Name: The Nuertogolem Costume
Content: You need to create a nuertogolem costume for Arisha Tanlin. This costume will be used in the park's next hit play.
ResultConclusion:
You can tell from Arisha's face that she was expecting to see the costume of a scarier creature.

Myths and rumours concerning the nuertogolems are taking on overly epic proportions in the city.

Name: The herbalist's tasks
Content: To begin with, you need to harvest nuts from the trees.
Introduction: Bolli told you all the tasks you need to do.
ResultConclusion: Bolli Verde thanks you for your help and gives you a nice sum of money in return.

Name: Help for Alphonsine
Content: Alphonsine explained to you that she needs marnite rocks outside her camp. You should excavate them and bring them back to her. Dont forget to bring a pick with you.
Introduction: Mylena explained to you where to find Alphonsine. You picked up your equipment and prepared to join her.
ResultIntroduction: While thanking you, Alphonsine suggested that you return to see Mylena in Kortombourg Square. She may have another mission for you, but you are beginning to tell yourself that it is almost impossible for her to have so many friends in need.

Name: Morning Song
Content: The morning winds produces music as they whistle through the trees. You also notice drums scattered throughout the forest. If you find and hit the right drum at the right time to imitate the winds' song, the music continues.
ResultConclusion:
This is surely a fairy ritual. There is no other possible explanation that makes sense.

Well, that's certainly how it seems at first sight.

Name: Precipice of the Scavenger
Content: The remains of a strange machine hang from the edge of the cliff. It might be wise to go and see if some parts can be recovered.

Name: The edge of the celestial woods
Content: You are in front of the Celestial woods. You can see in its center a giant tree with majestic colors.
ResultConclusion: You understand that the celestial woods will not let you in. You have learned a lot, but you will have to come back to visit this place later.

Name: The sealed crypt
Content: The crypt is sealed with magic you can't understand.
Introduction: All your clues lead you to a specific place in the ruin.
ResultConclusion:
Leighanna suddenly becomes very serious and settles in front of the crypt. A dark aura surrounds her as soon as she begins a song in a language that gives you chills.

You see jets of black scorches coming out of your companion's hands and melting the seal on the crypt door.

After a few moments of silence, Leighanna turns to you.

Name: The Bullies at the Bar
Content: Clearly, Claudel wasn't telling you everything. You make it your goal to find out more about the new residents of the inn.
ResultConclusion:
You learn that everyone is a little scared of these newcomers. Since they arrived, they have settled in a little too comfortably and have been acting as if they were elders of Enorwen.

As they are all armed, no one dares question them nor contradict them too much.

However, you did not find out who, if anyone, they are working for.

Name: A Lost Chest
Content: You have found a lost chest.

Name: The Colour of the Stars
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: A Good Stick
Content: You find a long, straight, well-balanced branch that would make an excellent quarterstaff.

Name: The Trolls' Ladder
Content: At the bottom of the ladder, a group of trolls has decided that this ladder is their property.
ResultConclusion: According to the ancient customs of the trolls, this ladder now belongs to you. You should be able to climb with it safely.

Name: Wisdom of One's Elders
Content: Leonidas seems very busy right now, but you manage to steal some time from him.
Introduction: You decide to go see Leonidas to learn more about Shadowbringer, the Maelstorm, and the strange perch.

Name: Blackbirds in the Wind
Content: You see blackbirds flying away towards the cliff, will you be able to catch up to them?

Name: Bygone Techniques
Content: Helpful pictograms above a target explain an ancient dagger-throwing technique.
ResultConclusion: In the end, the ancient technique wasn't all that effective and had probably been lost to time for good reason. Though with practice, you have improved your dagger fighting skills a little.

Name: A Well-dressed Scholar
Content: A scholar from Maliken is on the scene trying to figure out why he can't enter the Mists.

Name: The Other Side of Generosity
Content: Thume Atuvu and Raul Despommiers need your help to settle a small argument. Its up to you to find the best way to mediate.
ResultConclusion: Satisfied with your help, Raul and Thume thank you and invite you to share a pint or two with them.

Name: A distant corrupted memory, Volume 2
Content: The runes invoke a memory that you must face alone.

Name: Marco's Grim Tale
Content: You think that Marco may have discovered a black monolith like the one in Sombrazur. It's worth discovering more.
ResultConclusion: You think you have discerned the location of Marco's black rock. All you have to do now is visit the place.

Name: The blood of warriors
Content: The task of collecting the blood and bones of the Ratmen may seem thankless, but it is necessary if one wishes to locate the Scabonzi Warlord.
Introduction: Ralouf needs blood and bones belonging to the Scabonzi warriors in order to locate the warlord.

Name: The Sylvan Platform
Content: You know the platform is close by. It is time for a closer look.
Introduction: You will have to go to the base of the platform to discover who, or what, will descend.
ResultConclusion: The bandits inhabiting the platform have provided few clues as to their true motives, though your instinct tells you they're malicious. The platform's view over the fortress is too great of a security concern, you can't take the risk and so destroy the entire platform. Let's hope it wasn't just a kid's treehouse.

Name: Cybellus Biology Recipient Randul
Content: Randul Cybellus Egg Experimentation. Three Group Five So Fifteen And Three For Five So One. Error. Error.

Name: Friends, Foes, and Fairies
Content: You must convince the people of the egrom that you believe, or at least know and respect, their fairy legends.
ResultConclusion:
To your amazement, the locals continue to treat you like an ignorant stranger who doesn't understand anything.

You start to believe that the role of misunderstood victim is just part of their way of life.

Name: Wrath of the Vargr
Content: In order to continue helping the Grandmoons, you must first help Eugenie protect her children by getting rid of the vargrs that lurk in the area. You have to decide how to do that.
ResultConclusion:
Satisfied, Eugenie explains to you that the necromancer would have used totems to raise the living dead. To end the attacks, simply find the totems or eliminate all of the walking dead. 

You should now return to Matteus and Atora.

Name: The capture of the mimic
Content: You attempt to defeat the Doppleganger in hopes of capturing it.
ResultConclusion:
Just when you thought you could capture the creature, it casts a final spell and disintegrates before your eyes.

The room goes completely silent again, leaving you alone and with no clue as to from where it came or for whom this creature was working.

Name: Finding Matis the Spy
Content: Matis has disappeared. You must find him somewhere out on the plain.
Introduction: You need to search the plain to locate Matis.

Name: Searching for a Suspect
Content:
You and Matteus have agreed that it is vital to find the person responsible for the undead attacks. 

Think carefully about how you want to continue the investigation, the clue you find may well have a major influence on what will happen next.
Introduction: You have decided that it would be more interesting for you to return to Kortombourg to continue the investigation.
ResultIntroduction: You left Matteus's house to return to the village of Kortombourg where you had it in mind to carry out research to help your new friend and his wife.
ResultConclusion:
After having properly rewritten the testimonials concerning the presence of a richly dressed foreigner who would have performed necromantic research, you go to discuss your leads with the authorities.

Sir Verdant and Cedric Duverger unfortunately had nothing more to add, but Celeste Kortombe mentioned that nobles from Maliken had stayed at Diadem Manor. You decide to head there.

Name: Mystery at the Wall
Content: You have agreed to do Zechariah a favour by investigating the debris of the wall falling on the inn.
ResultConclusion: In fact, the old palisade wall is nowhere close to collapse. You learn that a spiteful city guard has been throwing stones down at the inn in revenge for a night that ended badly with Zechariah following too many flagons of OPCT.

Name: Introduction to the pillar
Content: Leonidas to ask you to wait here for him to bring the famous pillar.
Introduction: Leonidas asks you to join him at the Troll portal. He will provide you with a pillar that you will need to load onto a cart.
ResultConclusion:
You arrive at the gate with your small rustic wooden cart to load the pillar.

To your surprise Leonidas arrives at the scene with the pillar on a wheelless wagon that appears to be floating magically in the air.

Needless to say, your pride in your cart takes a hit.

Name: The Chores of the Rose
Content: Since you still don't have an official mentor to become a Companion of the Rose, you work on your squire's duties.
ResultConclusion: Although sometimes dull, working at the fortress helps you learn more about the guild.

Name: Sally's Summoning
Content: After arriving at the well, Sally prepares to summon the foul creature. She will need your help.
Introduction: Together with Sally, you must go to the nauseating well in Hordulk'hos Tomb. There, you will find Bobu.
ResultConclusion:
A hideous creature emerges from the nauseating well.

It looks fierce and gruesome, and all-too ready to face adventurers from the world of the living.

Name: Luxury materials for Grandflood
Content: The shipyard is looking for lots of wood and metal for the construction of its ships.
Hint: This weekly quest can be completed 10 times.

Name: Ruins of the Leviathan Portal
Content: Trogulnus have descended from the hills to establish an outpost in the ruins of the portal. You will have to evict them if you wish to use it.

Name: Somberseason Ritual
Content: You have found a place where you can perform the ritual of the Somberseason.
ResultConclusion:
At the end of your ritual, a Life Pearl materialises in front of you.

Hail to the Somberseason! Hail! Hail!

Name: Deciphering the Fresco Runes
Content: When you reach the fresco, your group encounters hooded figures who are attempting to erase the runes you discovered.
Introduction: You must accompany Rhavina to the runes so that she can decipher them.

Name: Forest Sanctuary
Content:
A remote sanctuary, dedicated to the forest, has been constructed next to the cliff. The view of the trees, lakes, and mountains is breath-taking. 

The place deserves some exploration.

Name: Investigation at Diadem Manor
Content: After arriving at Diadem Manor, you were disappointed and surprised to learn that the noble visitors had already left. Some servants remained on site to maintain the property. It's possible that a clue remains in the old manor that may yet help the Grandmoons.
Introduction: After having listened to Celeste Kortombe's words, you decide to head towards Diadem Manor.
ResultConclusion: You think you know the identity of the culprit. Now just go back to the Grandmoons and tell them what you've learned.

Name: Race to the Chest
Content: What appears to be a treasure map has been carved into a large tree. It's time to go on another adventure!

Name: The Dragon's Cave
Content: Colossal reptilian-looking footprints guide you to the entrance of a cave from which escapes a foul smell of death and decay. Many carcasses of bovids or even half-shredded horses litter the ground that leads to the depths of the cave. The scene leaves no room for doubt: you are indeed in front of a dragon's lair. These creatures are always the guardians of great wealth. Will your avarice take over your caution?
ResultConclusion: The treasure is purified and you are now bathed in gold. There is enough wealth to allow you to retire and take it easy for the rest of your life. Of course, that won't happen anytime soon, as you have an insatiable thirst for adventure and danger.

Name: The Treasure of Latortue
Content: You searched the area for a few minutes before finding the entrance hidden under a thicket.
Introduction: Wynael gave you directions to get to Cadence Latortue's abandoned laboratory. You will have to search the place and bring back what you find there.
ResultIntroduction: Foul odours seep from the walls of the ruins. Though they did not prevent you from carrying out comprehensive searches.
ResultConclusion:
Your alchemical studies aided your search, allowing you to locate some devices that are still in working order as well as two undiscovered manuscripts.

These manuscripts contained vital clues and blueprints on how to build a dispensary, and now you believe you have what it takes.

Name: Renovation at the Queen's Fianc
Content: Raul Despommiers is looking for fibers and leather for his work to expand his establishment.
Hint: This weekly quest can be completed 10 times.

Name: The traveling herbalist
Content: You have arrived in the bulgrof forest. Now you need to find these trees.
Introduction: The man, a herbalist, would indeed appreciate your protection. He wants to go to the Bulgrof forest to find a grove of exotic trees.
ResultConclusion: You finally find the grove. Bolli Verde thanks you and gives you some coins.

Name: Call of the Wild
Content: You have decided to let Ovie live a little while with the pack of White Wolves.
ResultConclusion:
Ovie will keep the secrets of his adventure to himself.

However, from the look in his eye and the confident way he now holds his shoulders back, you're certain that the experience has been enriching for him.

You wonder if he will ever want to return to the wild for good.

Name: The coded message
Content: Leonidas asks you to see the coded missive you found.
ResultConclusion:
Leonidas asks you to keep the missive for a while to find out if he is able to decode its content.

He asks you to stay alert when you visit Kortombe for clues about who might be the person who sent the missive.

Name: Controlling the Ruins
Content: The Grand Council of Druids is asking all combat-ready friends of the Circle to assist in the containment of corruption in ruins all across Ordval.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: The Barefoot Explorer
Content: You arrived at the adventurers camp mentioned by Sorka. It is now time to search for equipment that could help you get through the forest.
Introduction: Following Sorka's directions will take you to the desired camp.
ResultIntroduction: You find and take shoes that the traveller had abandoned. They could be useful for allowing you to explore certain territories.

Name: Serums for Marital Purposes
Content: The Thanasisson family asks all the herbalists of the seigneury to kindly provide some serums to speed up the preparations. Your cooperation is appreciated by people of the upper class.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: Gnoll Trainer Outpost
Content: You have found a desert gnoll outpost. An altogether barbaric looking place, your eye is quickly drawn to the gigantic caged scorpions. Do you have what it takes to best them?

Name: The Rock Face in the Rockface
Content: To your great surprise, a stone face emerges from the rock and starts talking to you. You understand that this is an ancient training machine. To solve its riddle, you must persuade the craggy visage that it is wrong.

Name: Preparations for Moulanasul
Content: Rolaundur asks you for a large sum to cover the costs of the first voyage and some materials to repair his ship.
ResultConclusion: Rolaundur shows you where the docking point will be on a map.

Name: The Paladin Armory
Content: Being well equipped in armor is a priority for the people of the Rose. The armory always needs new parts for its paladins.
Hint: This daily quest can be completed 25 times.

Name: Loan return
Content: You need to craft certain items for Zarou if you want to get your hands on the equipment needed for the ritual.
Introduction: Craft and return the items to Zarou in order to pay Ralouf's debt.

Name: Jailhouse Rocks
Content: One of the convoy of carts belonging to the workers has become stuck between the rocks. You must help them free it from its stony prison.
Introduction: Go to the place where the cart is trapped in the rocks.
ResultConclusion:
A pretty dagger can be found near the body of one of the gremfyrs. You approach it to carefully examine it and decide to take it with you. It will certainly come in handy one day.

Following all these adventures, the convoy can finally leave for the site.

Name: The Taming of the Legosus
Content: You search for a way to train one of the legosus living in the area.
Hint: This creature can reach level 30 and requires a solidity 25 cage.

Name: Materials for Issaya
Content: The Issaya Shipyard is looking for materials to build their next ship.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: Ruins of the Portal of Whispers
Content: You are standing in front of the ruins, looking for a way to activate the portal.

Name: To the Students' Rescue
Content: At the burrow, you see a wolf the size of a bull. It's visibly furious, tearing at the corpse of a young woman wearing a toga. You hear human screams coming from inside of Fenrigan's Lair.
Introduction: Naovic described the location of Fenrigan's Lair. It is your duty to go there to find the missing young alchemists. Prepare to fight.
ResultConclusion: The surviving students inside the burrow don't wait for Fenrigan's body to cool before seizing their chance to exit. Two of them limp out, seriously injured. The third, a young woman in a bloodstained dress, holds the golden mushroom in her hands.

Name: Elixir of Vigor
Content: As you arrive, your Lantern lights up in a bluish hue. It is a signal indicating the presence of an object affiliated with the Mists.
ResultConclusion: An Elixir of Vigor appears in your hand. It is with pride that you drink the sparkling liquid before the vial returns to the Mists.

Name: The barefoot (delete)
Content: You have arrived at the camp of the adventurer mentioned by Sorka. Now is the time to search it for equipment that could help you get through the forest.
Introduction: Leonidas directions will take you to the Unknown Mistwalker Camp.

Name: Mounts of nobility
Content: The number of nobles having their mounts at the hippodrome increases enormously during these festive times. Grooms are looking for these facilities to ensure the satisfaction of their boarders.
Hint: This daily quest can be completed 25 times.

Name: Gloves that Fit
Content: The craftswoman on site is overloaded and she needs your help to repair some gloves so workers are not delayed in their labour.
ResultConclusion: After all these repairs, you are confident that you could sew your own work gloves.

Name: Patrol Arwell
Content: After arriving at the raised outpost, you see that cylmos are entrenched at its base. Maybe the last team of scouts is still trapped inside. You will have to dislodge the cylmos if you want to find out.
Introduction: You mark the location in need of scouting-out on your map.
ResultConclusion: There was indeed a survivor hiding on the roof of the outpost. You help the scout recover from his adventure and continue on your way.

Name: Harvesting the Fields
Content: Workers are needed to harvest in the fields of Aranbourg.

Name: The Collector's Test
Content: Mystil asks you to prove that you are capable of working for one of its contacts.
ResultConclusion:
Mystil inspects the works to be certain that they will suit his client. She pulls out a small purse of strange crests and offers you some.

She then turns to a wall that seemed empty and brings up a bulletin board while saying a small incantation.

Name: A Brigand's Tale
Content: The brigand arrives, sweaty and nervous. He tells you that you must act quickly. He is eager to start walking and beckons you to follow him.
Introduction: The Longuemire Trail is located in this vicinity.
ResultConclusion:
The prisoner swears to you he didn't know the bandits would attack. After all, his promise was to show you where the bandits were.

Myrtille will decide for herself whether or not he deserves to serve a reduced prison sentence.

Name: A Lost Passage
Content: Aeryn asks you to find a passage, which is a shortcut to get to the Algent Plateau.
Introduction: The Algent Plateau is located here. You must find a passage that allows you to get to it quickly.

Name: The Quest for the Gift
Content: When you arrive at the scene, you find a crowd of peasants lined up to participate in a secretive ritual in an old tent. Your first instinct is to assume that you have encountered a scam and the so-called Gift will be sold to you for a handful of coins.
Introduction: You must go to a great tree nicknamed the Ancestor to participate in a strange event held by a certain Maratatinus.
ResultIntroduction: The ritual is very similar to the meditations you had to perform to influence the Mists. You don't fully understand this new energy. However, you are able to exert some influence over it.
ResultConclusion: Following the ritual, and Maratatinus's shocked reaction, you suspect that he never expected to actually meet someone with the Gift. Maybe your Mist Lantern had something to do with it.

Name: On a Break
Content: Renine Serval is absolutely knackered and needs to be replaced for a few hours. Your job will be to tell passers-by about Kortomis and ensure no one damages the statue.
Introduction: To relieve the exhausted guard of his duty, you will have to go to the Statue of Kortomis.

Name: Sewing Rights
Content: A disinterested official has been made responsible for naming the new owner of the right. A fairly small number of artisans have entered the competition, which should make your job easier.
Introduction: The rights of the Official Outfitter are being contested at Wellnear Castle.
ResultConclusion:
You have successfully obtained the rights to create official Wellnear clothing. You have learned that the purpose of the manoeuvre was to lower prices because the Sifer family charged far too much for the creation of the clothing.

Since you have no intention of becoming a full-time seamstress, you offer to subcontract the work to Carl Sifer. He accepts, though only because he could not bear to lose a title which has been in his family for so long.

Name: Working with Words
Content: Rumours always circulate in an inn. How you go about hearing them is up to you.

Name: The advice of Matis the spy
Content: Matis stands in front of you. This is the perfect time to ask him for advice.
Introduction: Go ask Matis the spy for advice in order to find a solution against the invasion of the Ratmen.

Name: A Luminous Crack
Content: Somehow, earthquakes have created a crevasse that self-illuminates. It's lovely, but whatever shall you do with it?

Name: The Mysterious Crypt
Content: After entering the cave, you notice a tunnel hidden behind climbing plants. Clawing your way through, you reach the main cave where the tombs are located. You must now look for clues.
Introduction: You bid farewell to the Grandmoons, then venture towards the cave indicated by Matteus.
ResultConclusion: After studying the candles and what seems to be the location of a magical ritual, you come to the conclusion that someone has recently passed through in an attempt to raise the dead. It is perhaps simply a coincidence after all that Matteus had visited the crypt a few years ago.

Name: Dark discovery
Content: Clinging to the walls of the well is the body of a man whose face has disappeared. His clothes, bearing the colours of Wellnear, seem of very high quality.
Introduction: When Palenne deactivates the cursed barrier, a vision of horror opens up before you...

Name: The Big Locked Door
Content: A large, thick metal door blocks access to what appears to be a cell. Through the keyhole, you can see a body lying on the ground. It's hard to tell if she's alive.
ResultIntroduction: You open the door with the keeper's key.

Name: Materials for Excavations
Content: The authorities are looking for a transporter to deliver materials that will be used for research at the Ruins of Malasette.

Name: The Duvergers of Kortombe
Content: You believe the fact that the two Duvergers, Charles and Cedric, have agreed to let the Barony of Kortombe fall into the hands of the Verdants is peculiar.

Name: "Free the beast!"
Content: A catoblepas, a creature that normally inhabits forested regions, is trapped in a cage built of rare metals. "Liberating" the creature could land you some lovely ingots.

Name: The Taming of the Worm
Content: You try to figure out how you could train one of the terrible worms living in the cliff.
ResultConclusion: You believe you can use magic to control one of the worms. Though it remains to be seen how the worm will survive in a cage in your domain.
Hint: This creature can reach level 40 and requires a solidity 40 cage.

Name: Standards of Behaviour
Content: A standard has been planted here for years. Surely no one will notice its disappearance...

Name: A Mysterious Craftswoman
Content: Atora explained to you that Eugenie Filouderien manufactures occult objects for people willing to pay a high price for them. How do you plan to learn more?
Introduction: Following the directions from Atora, you take the path to the Filouderien house.
ResultConclusion: After a few minutes of discussion, Eugenie admits that she knows how to counter the evil spell. However, she demands your assistance in another matter before she will give you the solution you are looking for. Since she has not broken any laws, you really have no choice but to listen on.

Name: Mystery of the Whispers
Content: You see what appears to be an ancient plinth which looks as if it could crumble in just a gentle breeze. Despite its fragile state, you sense a weak magical aura escaping from it. Investigating its surroundings may uncover some clues.

Name: Animal Husbandry
Content: Under the watchful eye of the mule, you study grazing to be able to house animals in your domain.

Name: Elimination: tawny bears
Content: Our hunters have been attacked several times by tawny bears in the Watchman's Comb. If anyone could go over there and kill a few, that would be great. They will of course be rewarded.
Introduction: Several hunters were attacked by wild bears in the valley of the watchman. A reward is offered to the person who reduces the number of bears in this region.

Name: Hydram Terror II
Content: Even with the terror pushed back, the barrier doesn't deactivate. Discouraged, you decide to return to report to Morak.
Introduction: Even with the terror pushed back, the barrier doesn't deactivate. Discouraged, you decide to return to report to Morak.

Name: A Helping Hand
Content: A caravan driver asks for help pushing his vehicle down the slope.

Name: Thoughtfulness and Thoroughness
Content: You must design some alchemist scales that you will present to Wynael.
ResultIntroduction: To your surprise, Wynael keeps the scales and explains that they will go to students of the scientific domain. It wasn't what you expected, but at least she doesn't forget to reward you for your efforts by giving you more alchemy training.

Name: Last Assault of the Dead
Content:
You share some cookies and beverages with the Grandmoons while waiting for the arrival of your rotting guests. 

Shortly before midnight, you hear the first moan of the living dead. It's time to draw your weapons and send them back to hell.
ResultIntroduction: Atora and Matteus thank you for your help and hope that their troubles will be resolved for the foreseeable future. They will be sure to slip in a good word about you to all who pass by their home.

Name: Quarry Study
Content: Joyal's business is not going very well. You can take advantage of the situation to learn more about its facilities.

Name: The Royal Hunt
Content: You arrive in the area where scouts claim to have seen royal chimeras.
Introduction: You attempt to find royal chimeras with Rolanko.
ResultConclusion:
In the end, you're not all that convinced that those truly were the legendary royal chimeras. They didn't really match the descriptions provided by the locals.

Noticing the boyish smile on Rolanko's face, you decide to keep your uncertainty to yourself.

Name: The Amorphous Enemy
Content: You have agreed to hunt a strange creature which appears at night in Maranchons Valley.
Introduction: You are trying to track down and investigate a strange and dangerous creature that appears in the region at night.
ResultConclusion: The captain pays you for engaging with the creature and learning about it. He even allows you to participate in combat training with his troops.

Name: Jot to Jot
Content: The site needs several different types of fibre. This time, Milane gave you an order for jot.
Introduction: You can find jot very close to the site in the Kortombe Plain.

Name: Badouk's Contact
Content: You are in front of the castle gate with Badouk, who seems rather taken aback at being refused entry.
Introduction: You must go to Wellnear Castle with Badouk in the hope of being able to speak discreetly with his "great contact".

Name: Bringing the Fight to the Scabonzis
Content:
During his espionage mission, Matis discovered that scabonzi warriors and shamans are hidden in the woodlands around the Silent Plain.

You have agreed to lead an offensive against them.
Introduction: Scabonzi warriors and shamans can be found in the woodlands surrounding the Silent Plain.

Name: The Kortombe candidate
Content: Having arrived in sight of Kortombe, you must choose who you will notify of the presence of a spy in the city.
Introduction: You head to Kortombe to warn the nobility of the possibility of a shape-shifting spy in the barony.
ResultConclusion:
You decide to keep the details of the events in Wellnear for yourself.

After your encounter, you emerge from Kortombe and notice smoke near the city palisade. You were so immersed in your thoughts that you didn't notice the new military camp set up on the plains.

A black banner floats above the encampment.

Name: Panorama: Brumedor Plain
Content: This seems like a suitable place for you to use your Lantern to scan the region.

Name: The Thousandshirts Bandits
Content: A ragtag unit of brigands and bandits is installed at the only passage to Millechemises that avoids the Narul Pass. The fight is inevitable if you wish to pass through.

Name: The Big Bad Vargr
Content: Fight the big bad vargr solo in the arena.
ResultConclusion:
When the fight is over, a guard dressed entirely in vargr fur comes to dance around the carcass.

The other members of the Assembly begin a chant reminiscent of the cries of the now-deceased animal.

Name: Mists of the Farfadet
Content: You feel the energy of the Mists in the surroundings.

Name: The Ethereal Fountain in the Sprawling Swamp
Content: The fountain really exists! All you need to do is complete the rest of the ritual.
Introduction: Sorka told you that the magic fountain would be on the island in the centre of Salamander Swamp.
ResultConclusion: You didn't really believe it, but after placing the remains of swampsharks in the fountain, a strange light surrounds you. You hear the ethereal words, "The marsh renews itself for eternity".

Name: The Hunted Hunter
Content: You rapidly organize yourselves into defensive positions in front of the cave, watching and waiting for the arrival of Hilla Shadowbringer.
ResultConclusion:
Just as the fatal blow was to be delivered, Shadowbringer dematerialises, disappearing in a thick cloud of black dust.

You are paralyzed in amazement for a few moments until the reality of what just happened dawns on you.

Hilla Shadowbringer is a Mistwalker!

Name: The Secret Path
Content: Charles has informed you that a secret path may exist nearby.
ResultConclusion: You discover, a little away from the caravans, a tunnel entrance that seems to go deep into the mountain.

Name: Patrol Snake Hill
Content: After arriving, you must find the best place for an overview of the forest.
Introduction: You mark the location in need of scouting-out on your map.
ResultConclusion:
There is indeed something moving in the forest. There is no way it's human. Nor is it multiple creatures. Whatever it is, it's huge. The trees themselves bend and shake as if some gigantic wave were rocking them. 

It could be that a giant snake is hunting in the heart of the forest. You lose track of its movement near a mountain where you notice what looks like the entrance to a cave.

Name: Herbs with Ouab
Content: You have agreed to help Ouab with his monthly plant picking. He promised to take you on as an apprentice herbalist afterwards.
ResultConclusion:
Ouab analyses the way you transport the plants to him. After a few growls and sniffs, he gives you a smile.

Ouab then hands you a piece of paper.

Name: Epidemic of Nightmares
Content:
Since the burgomaster of Kortombourg seemed worried, you have decided to comply with her request and to investigate the citizens' nightmares. 

You could, of course, wait for the answers to come to you or you could take direct action.
ResultConclusion: Celeste listens to you carefully. After the end of your speech, she thanks you, but admits that she does not feel reassured. She will certainly ask you for help to find out more very soon.

Name: The Guilds of Ordval
Content: There are several guilds which hold considerable influence over the province. Leonidas has asked you to forge bonds of trust with four of them. Talk with him to find out more.

Name: The Abilities of a Hero
Content: You take out your weapons and prepare to undergo Finnora's tests.
ResultConclusion: Once the test is over, a smile appears on Finnora's lips. She congratulates you and tells you that you are ready to take the next step.

Name: The Merchant of Circumstance
Content:
A merchant has decided to settle at the entrance of the swamp to sell jutug. He says customers are more receptive when they can see the equipment in action.

It may be worth explaining the dangers of the area.

Name: Twisted Firestarters
Content: Now you have arrived at the mountains, you must search for the source of the fires.
Introduction: Strange fires have been spotted on the steep slopes of the mountain range. Inspection is required post-haste.
ResultConclusion:
It looks as if the fires were lit to make the stone more brittle. It's possible that the fire-starters were merely mineral seekers looking for a quick fortune. However, as you approached, you saw black cloaked figures scramble out of sight. An observation which is a little ominous to say the least.

You should deliver your report on your next visit to Kortombourg.

Name: Between a Rock and a Hard Place
Content: A farmer was quietly building a stone enclosure when his tools broke on a harder surface. He asks you for help to get through the harder material.

Name: The exchange of minoris perfumes
Content: Vilo has no conception of the power of perfumes, only the size of the flake. This means that you can trade him a large amount of minoris perfume for a better perfume.
Hint: This daily scenario is for your companions' enchantments.

Name: "All this for a few plants!"
Content: A young girl playing make-believe asks you to take part in a series of weird tasks and imaginary games in exchange for some rare plants. The life of a Walker is sometimes a peculiar one.

Name: History of Riordan
Content: A chill formed between the two members of the family. You try to resolve the impasse.
ResultIntroduction: Palenne ended up accepting that the choice of his great-uncle made sense in the circumstances. Even if the loss of this loved one had a profound impact on his childhood. He comes out and grows from this experience.

Name: No Time to Die
Content:
You found Matis, but he's in bad shape. He's chained to a tree trunk with a gang of scabonzis surrounding him.

He's clearly been caught. Help him to get out of this precarious position.

Name: The Guardrail
Content:
The waterfall is magnificent, but the viewpoint is precipitous and treacherous in equal measure. 

A brave group of workers are installing a guardrail. Helping them would give you an even better view of the majestic cascades.

Name: The Novototem
Content: A strange totem is installed in the forest. It doesn't look old. Could it be a bewitched object cursing the inhabitants of Wellnear?
ResultConclusion:
Ultimately, no. But, they'll probably still be happy to know that you have rid them of this creepy totem pole.

And a chest was hidden underneath it! What fortune!

Name: A Tight-knit Group
Content: Your best option for ingratiating yourself with the elders is to bring some clothes of your own creation, which you may be able to exchange for stories of the Caravaneers' past.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: A Mistpiercer
Content: You have found a Mistpiercer, a machine capable of sowing chaos if misused. To destroy it, you will need to first face its guardians.

Name: The pack
Content: A group of lumberjacks is struggling with a pack of hyenas. Once again, people need your help.

Name: Training Day
Content: A group trains in a diverse variety of disciplines. You could spare some time to join their exercises.

Name: The One-armed Smuggler
Content: A suspicious-looking man with a hook for a hand stands near the cliff. You will need to know the smuggler code to speak to him.

Name: A Promising Encounter
Content: A hiker promises you a treasure if you help him. You have nothing to lose but time.

Name: Extreme Challenges
Content: A sign indicates the start of an extreme climbing trail. The challenge does not come from the technicality of the climb itself, but from the raw strength required to heave yourself up it.

Name: Returning to Sorka
Content: You found shoes at the camp indicated by Sorka. Now back at her campsite, you show her your find with undisguised pride.
Introduction: You have finished searching the camp. It's time to return to Sorka.
ResultIntroduction: It was with wry pleasure that she was surprised by your success. As promised, she gave you a staff to help you in your future adventures. You thanked her gracefully and continued on your way.
ResultConclusion: Now is the time to search the forest for the glass Leonidas asked for.

Name: The Collector's Magic Weapon
Content: The Collector, a mysterious friend of Mystil, seeks a particular weapon forged to his specifications.

Name: Suckhops
Content: You need to find out where the "suckhops" come from and then find specialists who can offer solutions for Galena's cultures.
ResultConclusion: The suckhops have, according to all appearances, been created to harm the hop fields of the region. You share your opinion with Galena.

Name: Oryctus Control
Content: Rofuran has asked you to fight the aggressive oryctus around the site. These critters only come out at night.
Introduction: To hunt Oryctus, you must patrol the camp and attack the Oryctus you come across.

Name: The Door of the Domain
Content:
Leonidas greets you on your arrival. He has placed a few Mist-filled marbles near the arch and beckons you nearer. 

Thereafter, he explains to you that you must crush the marbles to unleash their magic. Doing so will open the portal and grant you access.
Introduction: You look at your map and prepare to leave for the place indicated by Leonidas.
ResultIntroduction:
Leonidas opens up your Lantern and grabs the Mist Orb inside. A blue cloud surrounds his clenched hand and a magical wave echoes through you.

After closing the lantern, he indicates with a knowing smile that he has added magical energy to the Orb. He stretches the lamp towards the portal and you watch on in amazement as Mist floods out of the arch - surrounding the stone structure.
ResultConclusion: With the portal now activated, Leonidas confirms that you can now cross through it and take possession of your new domain. He says goodbye to you before you step through the arch, then he heads for the Throne of the Troll.

Name: Witch Hunt
Content: The Protector, Sir Tarul Verdant, is concerned about the presence of alleged witch hunters in the seigneury. You have now arrived near the camp and you must decide on your next step.
Introduction: Tarul Verdant has told you where the witch hunter camp can be found. Once your equipment is prepared, you will set off towards it.
ResultConclusion: Tarul Verdant thanks you for your service to Kortombourg. However, he fears that this is only the first confrontation with mercenaries playing witch hunters. He confirms that he already has a team of soldiers responsible for investigating these rumours and that he will not hesitate to contact you if necessary.

Name: Little Histories
Content: Nothing beats good discussions with the inhabitants of Kortombourg to learn more about life in the region. You still have to decide how you intend to go about getting to know the Kortombourgers.
ResultConclusion: You now know a little more about the lordship and are eager to discover more during your adventures.

Name: Academic Alchemy
Content: A group of Korllights Academy students are trying an experiment to purify the feros. They are going to need help because their project is evidently not going well.

Name: The Kortombe Ceremony
Content: You have been invited to a social evening at the castle of Kortombe. During the evening, many important characters, dignitaries, and Kortombe high-rollers are present. All that remains to do is to decide how you will spend your evening.
ResultConclusion:
The evening ends with a special ceremony during which Relene Kortombe gives a few citizens who have distinguished themselves the privilege of wearing the tabard and cape of Kortombe.

You are surprised to learn that you are one of these lucky few.

Name: A Lost Chest
Content: You have found a lost chest.

Name: Petty Theft
Content: Many citizens have complained about the disappearance of property from their homes. Tarul Verdant has asked you to investigate since he fears his men would be too heavy handed. It's up to you how you plan to do it.
ResultConclusion: Tarul frowns, listening intently as you tell your story. He thanks you for your inquiry and assures you that he will take of the next steps.

Name: Evaluate Corrin
Content: As Leonidas explained to you, you need to check if Corrin can work with you in the Mists. He seems to be a decent person, but you must ensure that he will not report you as an evil sorcerer to the authorities of Kortombourg.
ResultConclusion:
Corrin seems perfectly suited to be your first worker. Once you have built an accommodation building in your domain, you can recruit him.

Leonidas should be informed that you now sufficiently understand recruitment.

Name: A Special Request for the Warehouse
Content: The construction team building the new Wellnear Hangar requires materials.
Hint: This daily quest is available as long as another quest is not completed.

Name: Ancient Library
Content: You're somewhat amazed that the brutish Rufgarrs hadn't used all the books as fuel for their fires.
ResultConclusion: To your surprise, you find a dusty yet useful old tome about wielding mage staves.

Name: "The swamp shall not pass!"
Content: A team from Korllights Academy is trying to prevent the marsh from growing beyond its boundaries. They are testing the resistance of certain materials to moisture. Since you have nothing else to do, couldn't you help?

Name: Minotroll Espionage
Content: You must spy on the entrance of the famous mine to find out if the trolls have planned to collapse the passage at the first sign of hostility.
Introduction: Toride has asked you to spy on mining trolls to see if an attack could cause the new entrance to the mine to collapse.
ResultConclusion:
After careful consideration and observation, you realise that concerns over whether the trolls have an advanced strategy to protect themselves from humans was grossly outlandish.

For them, having humans in the mine will probably be entertaining.

Name: Ralouf's mix
Content: Bring back the herbs and mushrooms Ralouf needs to make his mixture that scares away the Ratmen.
Introduction: You must bring Ralouf the herbs and mushrooms he needs.
ResultConclusion: Ralouf thanks you for this great service and now considers you a friend. He invites you to come and see him on occasion to discuss various topics.

Name: Battle at Darkest Night
Content:
Tension hangs in the air as you supper with Matteus and Atora. You exchange old stories but all your thoughts are on the battle ahead. 

A little before midnight, you hear the growl of the guard dogs and glimpse the walking dead lurching towards the entrance to the palisade. 

It's time to draw your weapons.
ResultConclusion: You have finally won the victory against the enemies of Matteus and Atora. To thank you, they invite you to share more food and a few bottles of wine. Though he doesn't forget to give you a more tangible reward too.

Name: Harvest Aid
Content: After arriving at Geraldine's camp, she explains to you that she needs a few extra bundles to meet the demand. To collect them, you will have to travel a little further from the camp. The work could take a few hours, but the pay will be decent.
Introduction: Mylena explained to you where Geraldine and her harvesters are. You should go there and meet them.
ResultConclusion: Geraldine suggested that you return to see Mylena in Kortombourg. A renown busybody, she will certainly have new tasks for you.

Name: Halberd Fishing
Content: An old halberd has been turned into a fishing harpoon. Maybe a little sport would do you good?
ResultConclusion:
Yuck! These fish are inedible!

However, this little angling adventure will give you some ideas on how to better use pole weapons.

Name: Wood for Goods
Content:
Umphric Podor asked you to act as a negotiator in a dispute with the lumberjack Berthier Granfore. 

You don't need to answer the moral questions underlying the two parties' economic visions, though you will need to find some common ground between the man and the Guild of Merchants. How you plan to do that is up to you.
ResultConclusion: Umphric thanks you for your work and confirms that he will need you again soon.

Name: Woodcutting Mastery
Content: You are ready to perform the ritual of the woodcutter.

Name: Cape of the Mountains and Cape of the Forests
Content: Celeste Kortombe would like to add two capes to her wardrobe. One of ortas for visits to Bonarcane Forest and the other of lan for visits to the Ridiculous Mountains.

Name: A potion for a vision
Content: To get your answer, you'll have to drink this strange potion...
Introduction: Rolonet takes a ladle, fills it with potion and hands it to you.
ResultConclusion:
After defeating the sightings, you notice a small cave. On each side are miniature versions of the totem you saw in Corinna Forest.
While exploring the surroundings, you arrive at the top of a cliff and, in the distance, see Kortombourg. You are in Haularken Forest.
Suddenly, your vision blurs and you wake up at Saroskor'nak Tower. Rolonet is observing you and smiling.

Name: Pyram Terror II
Content: Even with the terror pushed back, the barrier doesn't deactivate. Demoralised, you decide to report back to Morak.
Introduction: Even with the terror pushed back, the barrier doesn't deactivate. Demoralised, you decide to return to report to Morak.

Name: Sylph's Mixtures, Volume 1
Content: You work with Sylph to create a Sylphian mixture to help her against crystals corruption.

Name: The Challenge of the Little Ones
Content: Children of the Claw must be able to fight against the creatures that prowl around them. The dice of destiny will decide who is the enemy of the day.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: The camp of the mages
Content: Smells of burnt wood caress your nostrils. Your nose guides you to a small clearing that seems empty. The trickle of smoke that escapes from nowhere leaves you perplexed. Your judgment recommends a cautious approach.
ResultConclusion: Judging by their aggressiveness and desire to remain secret, you come to the conclusion that their intentions were undoubtedly malicious and that their death is a good thing. Your search of the camp does not allow you to know their motives, but you nevertheless get your hands on some interesting loot.

Name: Forbidden Leather
Content: An illegal leather dealer stands by the river. You will need to know the right codes to do business with him.

Name: Inspire Finn Vorel
Content: Finn becomes discouraged at the last moment. You must convince him to meet the Dreamer.

Name: Date with the Moon
Content: You have finally arrived at the meeting place. The scenery is as beautiful as Sorka described.
Introduction: Sorka Simik invites you to join her at the top of the Ridiculous Mountains at night to watch the moon rise in the distance.
ResultConclusion:
At first it seems that you've been stood up. There is no one around. After a while you see a large fire on the east side of the summit. There appears to be a camp nearby.

You suddenly realise this was another of Sorka's tricks - this time so she could introduce you to her famous friends.

Name: The River Cache
Content: While concentrating on your footing, you unexpectedly take some prickly brambles to the eye. Momentarily blinded, you trip and stumble into the river. Now closer to the ground, you notice something shiny under the water's surface.

Name: Sylph's Mixtures, Volume 6
Content: You work with Sylph to create a Sylphian mixture to help her against crystals corruption.

Name: Traversing Kortombe
Content: You are now at the meeting point. Just keep an eye on the boy to make sure nothing happens to him.
Introduction: You had to wait for Myrko Arnoldus to complete his preparations, then you worked out a route with him to get to the meeting point.
ResultIntroduction: After several minutes of waiting, you see the caravan moving towards your position. Myrko thanks you for your help and prepares to join it, remembering to reward you for your services.

Name: Clear Cut?
Content: A group of lumberjacks armed with giant axes seek to cut down all of the erilid in the Woodlands of Silence. It would benefit everyone to make them understand that the forest will regenerate better if they do not clear the nature in its entirety.

Name: Poisoned Spring
Content: A spring has long been used by travellers to refresh themselves. A sign with a skull has now been stuck in front of it.
ResultConclusion: Morillas have been planted, seemingly intentionally, near the spring. This is undoubtedly the source of the poison.

Name: Investigation at Diadem Manor
Content: After arriving at Diadem Manor, you were disappointed and surprised to learn that the noble visitors had already left. Some servants remained on site to maintain the property. It's possible that a clue remains in the old manor that may yet help the Grandmoons.
Introduction: Near the exit of the crypt, you found clues suggesting the individual you're looking for is at Diadem Manor. You must go there.
ResultIntroduction: You are almost certain to have discovered the identity of the culprit. It's a solid enough lead that you can return to the Grandmoons and tell them what you have learned.

Name: The search for the ruin
Content: You work with Marco Filsderabouf to find out if an entrance under Mount Siho exists.
ResultConclusion:
Eventually you found a stream that seems to lead into a larger cavern.

However, you come up against a magical protection that prevents you from going deep into the cave.

One thing is certain, if there is magic protection, you are in the right place.

You need Palenne to open the cursedd gate.

Name: Issaya's Galleon
Content: To celebrate the centenary of the shipyard's inauguration, the authorities of Larcen have chosen to finance the construction of a gigantic galleon. The materials will be purchased at premium prices so as not to delay the work.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: Under Siho
Content: You have arrived at the place where you thought you could enter the castle.
Introduction: You try to cross the Aran cave to reach the Wellnear castle. While looking for traces of the ruin of Jolistar that Palenne is looking for.
Hint: You must have Badouk and Palenne in your party to do this quest.

Name: Tortolion infestation
Content: The mine of Illusions is infested with tortolions and the miners can no longer fend them off. It's all up to you, now.
Introduction: The mine of Illusions is infested with tortolions. Enter the mine and eliminate them.

Name: Marshes according to Tagnard
Content: You follow Tagnard's training to be able to survive the surrounding swamp.

Name: Showdown with the Strawman
Content: The council awaits your report on the creature hunting on Lovers' Plain.
Introduction: You are now ready to battle the Strawman to purify the ruin. The Circle Council is awaiting news of your fight.
ResultConclusion:
The council is a little annoyed by the use of your magic column.

They are likely to come back to you with questions on the matter.

Name: Polearm Mastery
Content: Serocca has agreed to show you her polearm skills. Let's hope you're ready.
ResultConclusion:
Let's be frank. You are no match for Serocca. 

Even though she ran rings around you and dealt you a few painful blows, it didn't stop you from learning a lot about handling polearms.

Name: The Mine Foreman
Content: A Snake Mine foreman has to return to work, but he's terrified of the cylmos. He requested an escort for his trip.
Introduction: You will have to accompany the foreman to Snake Mine.
ResultConclusion: The foreman asks you to thank Protectress Florentina for the service.

Name: "Don't look down!"
Content:
The trail ahead is narrow and precipitous. One wrong move and a cart of goods could careen over the edge and tumble into the river. 

Perhaps, that's already happened...

Name: Echo of the Two Sisters
Content: Rakham is awaiting your report on your expedition to Nopeak.
Introduction: You have decided to overcome the echo of the past of the two troubled sisters, and then report to Rakham.
ResultConclusion:
The druid listens carefully to your report.

He doesn't know who tried to erase the runes of the past.

Name: A Lost Chest
Content: You have found a lost chest.

Name: Hatchets, Daggers, and Staves
Content: Due to the increased presence of the gremfyrs in Caledorn, the region's landowners wish to arm themselves.

Name: Run to the course of Wellnear!
Content: For once, luck smiles on you! You approach the vault door and it opens. You come face to face with the two people you wanted to see.
Introduction: You try to go inside the castle of Wellnear to find the creature that took the place of the lord.

Name: In the Depths of the Lithofortress
Content: You are investigating the Lithofortress for Leonidas. Your objectives are to learn more about the victims of the Rufgarrs and "talk" to the King of the Rufgarrs. Badouk awaits you impatiently in the comfort of the relay.
Introduction: At the end of every great adventure, there is an important enemy to take down. Your expedition to the Lithofortress will be no exception.

Name: Ruins of Kordan Portal
Content: You are standing in front of the ruins, looking for a way to activate the portal.

Name: Royal Discussions
Content: You are in front of the King who looks at you aggressively. Well, as much as a tree can. You must now follow Leonidas' instructions.
Introduction: You head towards Sylvester Court hoping that Leonidas' plan will work.
ResultIntroduction: After all these adventures, you end up with a strange, curved branch. You assume this is the invitation you were looking for.

Name: Present to the Pirenzors
Content:
You have been instructed to provide a gift to the Pirenzor family...

In Gantras, it is customary when an individual stands out in the community that he offers a gift of his creation to the ruling family.

You have no choice. It's a legal decree.

Name: Study of the Dark Feathers
Content: Mages in the Arcane Tower are interested in the dark-coloured Psychotropul feathers you received from the Psychaganger's reflection.

Name: The Solitary Clearing
Content: A chest has been left in the centre of the clearing. You could search it, seeing as no one is around.

Name: The Taming of the Boar
Content: The boar seems naturally docile to you. You think he might be a good candidate to tame.
ResultConclusion: After all those treats, the boar seems ready to follow you.
Hint: This creature can reach level 20 and requires a solidity 15 cage.

Name: A Mistpiercer
Content: You have found a Mistpiercer, a machine capable of sowing chaos if misused. To destroy it, you will need to first face its guardians.

Name: Stuck
Content: Your right foot slipped through a crack on the ground and got stuck.
ResultConclusion: After moving a few small rocks, you manage to free your foot.

Name: Protection of the Four Elders
Content: You must complete four missions for Reginold. You need to find the adventurers in question and offer them your aid.
ResultConclusion:
Following the delivery of your report, Reginold invites you to partake in a special training session where he shows you an exceptional combat technique.

You would have ideally liked to have known the technique BEFORE your dangerous adventure...

Name: Delivery to Enorwen
Content: A courier capable of crossing the Epirpon Pass is needed for a delivery of fresh hops from Dirontol. The cargo must be delivered to Mirousana Mill.
Introduction: You must deliver the cargo to Mirousana Mill.

Name: Lithofortress Research
Content: Badouk would have stopped at the relay to rest and have a few beers. Inquire with the customers or employees to find out more.
Introduction: Head to the Biggoat Relay. According to Leonidas, you have a good chance of finding Badouk there, or at least someone who could tell you where to find him.

Name: Vargr Control
Content: Rofuran has asked you to kill five Vargrs in the surrounding areas. You will find Vargrs in the Crown Woodland.
Introduction: You will find vargrs in the Crown Woodland.

Name: Back to the Cart
Content: After liberating Finn Vorel from his little kidnappers, you agreed to return to Varko's cart.
Introduction: Staying vigilant the whole time, you and Finn return in the direction of Varko's cart.

Name: The Secret of Sombrazur
Content: The monolith is easy to spot at the bottom of the cavern, under the waterfall. It is a jet black stone in which you can see your own reflection. But is it really magic?
Introduction: Arcanist Clara wants you to investigate a mysterious monolith in Sombrazur Cavern.
ResultConclusion:
After studying the area, you understand that the monolith is the central component of an altar used for summoning a reflection of a creature from the Den of Darkness - a world hidden in the depths of the earth.

You're relieved to discover that, for once, it's not a world linked to the Mists.

You find a strange black feather on the altar. You take it with you to examine later.

Name: The Search of Corinna
Content: On the ground near the plinth, you discover a plaque upon which a message is written: "Near a dusty tomb and under the earth, death makes its home."

Name: The robbers' ambush
Content: A cart containing goods is overturned on its side as its owners try to flee from a brigand's ambush. Bandits are often cowards... maybe you can scare them away by threatening them?
ResultConclusion: After showing them the route to the safest route, they thank you one last time and insist on giving you some of their goods as a token of their gratitude before continuing their long journey.

Name: Miner in distress
Content: Further down the cliff, on a small ledge, a man waves to you. It looks like he's stuck. You should help him.
ResultConclusion: The man thanks you several times in a row. He then explains that he is a miner from the mine of Illusions, located a little further, and that he fell while fleeing from a "very aggressive little green monster". Probably a trogulnus.

Name: The hunter's corpse
Content: You see the inert body of a hunter. No wound marks or gash marks on his corpse suggest he was killed, but his neck is broken and bent at an angle that sends shivers down your spine.
ResultConclusion: You are extra careful during your ascent so as not to suffer the same fate as the deceased hunter. Once at the top, you have a breathtaking overview of the whole forest. Inside, a stack of skins awaits you as loot for your efforts. You then go back down and continue on your way, satisfied with your findings.

Name: Looters Without Borders
Content: Brigands from the neighbouring seigneury have apparently taken up residence in the Living Wall Forest. Lianthal Allistair would like you to take care of this problem. It's up to you to decide your next course of action.
Introduction: You leave Lianthal Allistair to head quietly towards the camp he indicated to you.
ResultIntroduction: You went to the woods and looked for traces of the brigands. After tracking them for an hour, you arrive at their makeshift camp.
ResultConclusion: You return victorious to Lianthal. He seems impressed with your work, but does not take the time to congratulate you. Instead he throws your reward in your direction and continues scanning the horizon for unwelcome outsiders.

Name: Invasive Gremfyrs
Content: Myrtille asks you to kill 10 gremfyrs to help keep Kortombe secure.
Introduction: Myrtille asked you to hunt down gremfyrs in the forest. She warned you that many patrols will be in the area.

Name: A Mistpiercer
Content: You have found a Mistpiercer, a machine capable of sowing chaos if misused. To destroy it, you will need to first face its guardians.

Name: Privacy Policy
Content: Jahiri challenges you to find a secret he has shared with his employees. Will you be able to loosen their lips?
ResultConclusion: During your "game", you learn that another retirement home named the Black Horse Pavilion is hidden in the Silent Plain, near Knight's Lake.

Name: The Caravan Guard
Content: Obviously happy with your answer, Varko explained to you that his guard left in the direction of Kortombourg. You must therefore find his trail.
