Content: The ruins are infested with ghosts and ghouls during the night. You try to replicate the technique of the previous ruin, triangulating the location of the corruption's source.
Introduction: You have agreed to study the creatures that haunt the Swamp of Ruins.
ResultConclusion: Your trick worked! You are certain of the place causing the corruption.

Name: Hammer's Ruin
Content: When you arrive at the site of the ruins, there is nothing there that seems all that impressive to you. But in your line of work, it is vital not to be fooled by appearances.
Introduction: The Order of Kortomis asks you to go and inspect a new ruin found on Hammer Hill.
ResultConclusion: Even after a closer inspection, you find no connection between the legendary Kortomis and the ruin.

Name: A distant corrupted memory, Volume 3
Content: The runes invoke a memory that you must face alone.

Name: Patrol the Shield of Astrid
Content: A group of scouts is needed for the central parts of the Shield of Astrid. Watch out for hostile creatures in the area.
Introduction: You mark the location in need of scouting-out on your map.

Name: Vandals Under the Slabs
Content: Rhys Pair is concerned that vandals are rampant at the cemetery and has asked you to investigate. It is up to you to determine the best way to obtain clues.
ResultConclusion: What you've learned puzzles Rhys. He scratches the beginning of the beard lining his chin, then thanks you for your work without smiling. Obviously, he does not approve of your conclusions.

Name: Colour for a Plant
Content: Here is the plant of the day.
Hint: This daily quest has no success limit. This daily quest will give you access to other quests depending on your number of successes.

Name: Teeth of the Tortolion
Content: Aeryn asked you to collect some teeth from the tortolions on the Algent Plateau.
Introduction: Find the tortolions in order to recover their teeth.

Name: Axes for Surizor Camp
Content: Joshua's axes order never arrived. He asked you to make some for him.
Introduction: Joshua asked you to craft axes for him.

Name: The Camp of the Allies
Content: You believe the Camp of the Allies you discovered north of Gantras may be a cover for a group of thugs. This information is worth passing to the Order.

Name: Sylph's Mixtures, Volume 4
Content: You work with Sylph to create a Sylphian mixture to help her against crystals corruption.

Name: The Unknown Painter
Content:
To put an end to the rumours, you will need to identify who drew the painting and wrote the texts that were planted with those of Reinfort Kortombe. 

It was probably someone close to the court. It's up to you to work out the best way of finding out who that is.
ResultConclusion:
The baroness listens to you talk about Yamal Filouderien, then calmly thanks you for your research. She confirms that some members of this line live in the seigneury, but most of them left the territory after falling into disgrace. 

She believes there is nothing else to do at this time and confirms that she will contact you if necessary.

Name: Ecology of the Crucible
Content: You decide to take the time to study the swamp in the hope of learning more about this type of environment.

Name: Cart Blanche
Content: The Raboufs use a small cart to transport their products to the different markets of the region. By helping them, you will learn more about transportation.
ResultConclusion: Having finished the work, you suspect you will be able to build your own cart.

Name: Many Beasts in Manynotes
Content: You have agreed to hunt creatures living in Manynotes Forest for the Lord of Wellnear.
Introduction: You can find your prey in Manynotes Forest.
ResultConclusion: The blood not yet dry, you have finished all your dirty work. Though you are none the wiser as to why this hunt was commissioned.

Name: A Lost Chest
Content: You have found a lost chest.

Name: A Point of Spectral Interest
Content: You feel a presence observing you.
Introduction: The Circle asks you to visit what appears to be the source of the corruption in a quest to discover its secrets.
ResultConclusion:
Your research allows you to understand that the manifestation of Valdiss is an echo of the past.

This echo will always come back to haunt the place, whatever your actions towards it. More research is needed to understand the source of this eternal haunting echo.

Name: The Magpie
Content: You notice a magpie's nest in a tree. What shiny treasure might he have scavenged?

Name: A Mistpiercer
Content: You have found a Mistpiercer, a machine capable of sowing chaos if misused. To destroy it, you will need to first face its guardians.

Name: Inspire the Dreamer
Content: Your party retreats to seek information that may help the famous Dreamer prepare for the events of the Mists.
ResultIntroduction:
With all your inspirations found, it's time for Finn to meet the Dreamer.

Your party is waiting for him to go, but he doesn't move.
Hint: Ideas for inspiration will appear depending on the quests you have done.

Name: Tarasquan Ecology
Content: You must hunt giant carposorius in Tarasquan for Junua.
ResultConclusion: Junua seems to take pleasure in analysing the bodies of creatures.

Name: Golem Problem Assignment
Content: Detection Problem Golem Reset or Destroy. Danger. Danger.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: The Taming of the Bear
Content: Taming a bear is quite a challenge. These beasts are intelligent but unpredictable.
Hint: This creature can reach level 40 and requires a solidity 35 cage.

Name: The Hideout
Content: Amidst the plain's rolling hills, you notice a small building guarded by malevolent-looking brigands. What could they be hiding?
ResultConclusion: The brigands appeared to be trying to design explosives made from a range of materials. You didn't quite get to grips with their intentions, but you managed to nab some of their ingredients and sabotage their plans.

Name: Ruins of Tarzakon Portal
Content: You are standing in front of the ruins, looking for a way to activate the portal.

Name: The Crushed Chest
Content: The scree here indicates recent rockfall. It appears the camp's inhabitant got away in time, though you notice a chest crushed underneath some of the loose rock.

Name: Weapon of the Day
Content: Forgagus offers you a daily challenge to produce and provide a weapon in exchange for one taken at random from his warehouse. Is it your lucky day?
Hint: This daily quest has no success limit.

Name: "Protect the goats!"
Content: Local goat breeders are convinced that it would be better to breed here rather than in safer plains. The goats need help to protect themselves from mountain predators. Can you create a defence system for them?

Name: A Lost Chest
Content: You have found a lost chest.

Name: The Attack
Content: A caravan has recently been ambushed by scabonzis. Some carts have been abandoned, their owners fled or dead. Perhaps something of interest remains in the debris.

Name: A Lost Chest
Content: You have found a lost chest.

Name: The Taming of the Spider
Content: You try to understand the spiders living in the area in hopes of training one.
ResultIntroduction: You're confident that you have successfully controlled one of the spiders using your sap concoction.
Hint: This creature can reach level 30 and requires a solidity 30 cage.

Name: Crown Minerals
Content: Milane has asked you for minerals that can be mined in the hills.
Introduction: You can extract ore in hills and mountains like the nearby Crown Hills
ResultConclusion: After taking possession of the minerals you brought back to her, Milane rewarded you for your work.

Name: A Mistpiercer
Content: You have found a Mistpiercer, a machine capable of sowing chaos if misused. To destroy it, you will need to first face its guardians.

Name: Damsel in Distress
Content: Any kidnappers should be hidden inside the house. Your survival instinct dictates that you act with caution, but your adventurous spirit tells you that surprise can be your best weapon. The next step is up to you.
Introduction: Thume described the place where the young woman should be. You have put your equipment in order and prepared to go rescue her.
ResultConclusion:
It seems obvious that there is no needy noblewomen nor princess in distress, but a willing participant in what would have been an ambush. 

You could return to Kortombourg to seek reinforcements, but the brigands would see them coming and run off into the wilds. In addition, you would lose out on the opportunity to be seen as a hero. Better to resolve this situation immediately.

Name: Pay Packet from Podor
Introduction:
Finn Vorel and Varko Petivenor convince you that they will be safe travelling onwards to Kortombourg without additional assistance from you.

After some friendly exchanges and more thanks, you agreed to reunite with them at the market. Either way, you should pocket your pay from Umphric Podor.

Name: Grave Tidings
Content: It's clear when you arrive at the cemetery that Rhys has no interest in complying with the militia's message. You will have to make him listen to reason.
Introduction: You have been asked to go to Bentro Cemetery to deliver a letter to Rhys and make him understand the gravity of the message.

Name: Find the Warlord
Content: Finding a warlord is not an easy task. Matis needs you to lend him a hand in this mission.
Introduction: Help Matis the spy locate the hiding place of the Scabonzi warlord.
ResultConclusion: Despite your strenuous efforts and Matis's expertise, you are unable to locate the Ratman Warlord. Your guide warns you: such a hard-to-spot warlord undoubtedly has a lot of experience. If you manage to find it one day, this opponent will be formidable.

Name: Sorka and the Lost Mask
Content: You have agreed to help Sorka in her quest to find an ancient mask. In exchange, she will help you with your quest for the glass shards.
Introduction: Sorka tells you that the entrance to Trolgobeth is north of the camp.

Name: The Ritual of the Plank
Content: The ritual consists of standing on a plank above the waters while Jon Thorval recites a strange text.
ResultConclusion:
Jon Thorval leaves the stage without saying another word to you. You understand that the ceremony is over.

A city councillor comes to explain to you that you can now wear the official clothes of the city. But beyond that, you're no more important than you were yesterday.

Name: The Rylenback
Content: In the hopes of earning your place in the Nest of the Assembly, you have agreed to kill the Rylenback.
Introduction: According to your information, the Rylenback is living on one of the mountains near Thorval.
ResultConclusion:
It's clear that Serocca wasn't expecting you to return, let alone return victorious.

Contrary to her word and your expectations, she seems even more unwilling to converse now.

Maybe one day that situation will change.

Name: A Mistpiercer
Content: You have found a Mistpiercer, a machine capable of sowing chaos if misused. To destroy it, you will need to first face its guardians.

Name: Tools for Dirontol
Content: The hop house requires tools for its work.
Hint: Progress of this questline: {0}/{1}

Name: A big chest!
Content: A chest in a dungeon! Too classic. Do you open it?

Name: Panorama: Ridiculous Mountains
Content: This seems like a suitable place for you to use your Lantern to scan the region.

Name: The Search of the Crucible
Content: On the ground near the plinth, you discover a plaque upon which a message is written: "In height, we cross despite the strong wind. In the distance, an exotic island."

Name: Chillwinds deliveries
Content: You understand after accepting the quest why Stoe didn't want to make the deliveries. The concept is that the packets will produce a little music when they are near their recipient. Good research!

Name: Strange Engravings
Content: Symbols are carved into the stones of the cliff. What an enigma.

Name: Panorama: Prankster Hills
Content: This seems like a suitable place for you to use your Lantern to scan the region.

Name: Dagger Mastery
Content: Saraya has agreed to show you just how exciting dagger combat can be.
ResultConclusion:
That was... special. You never would have thought that dagger fighting could be practiced that way.

After your training, Saraya goes back to her business as if nothing had happened.

Name: Message for Gantras
Content: As you approach the meeting point, you find yourself facing a creature from Norkantas. She seems determined to make her new nest here and let her foul offspring run riot. To pass your message onto the next messenger, she will have to be defeated.
Introduction: You must cross the Leviathan Plain to reach Marquise Valley. Once there, another messenger will take over.
ResultConclusion: The creature now finally vanquished, the messenger of Gantras appears as if by magic. You give him the message and move on.

Name: Fresh Fish
Content: A town can never have enough fresh fish. And any help in providing them is most welcome. You'll find plenty along the beach nearby.

Name: Face Time
Content: As the sun begins to go down, faces appear in the trees and ask you strange questions. You must answer all their questions before the sun disappears completely.
ResultConclusion:
You end up making it around all of the faces. You thought you were finding meaning in all their questions, but you still don't understand.

The spirit of the fairies is impenetrable and incomprehensible!

Name: Trade of Decorations
Content: The Marquee is decorated with all manner of interesting substances right now. Claw Assembly members have all kinds of parties and recipes that use these substances. You could barter with them, you never know what you might stumble upon.
Hint: This daily quest has no success limit.

Name: The Pursuit of Sorka
Content: Too late. Sorka is not here. The places are not at all what you expected.
Introduction: Sorka didn't wait for you! You try to get to the cave before it disappears again.
ResultIntroduction:
Further into the cavern, in a place where the luminous dust is thicker, you notice that a female form is erased from the dust. As if someone had passed through the stone and left their mark.

Judging by the curves, it could well be Sorka.

One of your companions confirms this theory by bringing a bag containing your friend's equipment that he found in a corner.

Name: A Mistpiercer
Content: You have found a Mistpiercer, a machine capable of sowing chaos if misused. To destroy it, you will need to first face its guardians.

Name: Driftwood
Content: You notice logs of salancedar trapped in branches near the shore.

Name: Clothes for the Kofo-Lun
Content: You undertake to create a selection of practical clothing to help the people of Kofo-Lun on their expedition
ResultConclusion: Lily looks at the clothes you made with some disgust.

Name: Meeting of the Great Guard
Content: Several Rufgarrs are gathered in the room. The most ferocious-looking of the lot appears to be their leader. A big old key swings from his belt, jangling as he violently gesticulates to his fellow guardians.
ResultIntroduction: You take the key from the great guardian's body.

Name: Hare Leather to the Construction Site
Content: Construction workers need many materials to do their jobs. To help them, you have been asked to provide hare leather.
Introduction: You can find hare leather in the Kortombe Plain.
ResultIntroduction: You handed in the hare leather as requested, and then received your reward.

Name: Tools for Recruits
Content: Ulrick needs some tools for his new recruits.

Name: The Darkblade Expedition
Content: You arrive on location, carefully choosing a spot where you haven't previously come across any nuertorituals.
Introduction: You have the incredible mission of escorting Brosa the civil servant to Darkblade Marsh and proving to her that the trees there are not actually all golems.

Name: Message for the Sanctuary
Content: You have finally arrived at the sanctuary. All you have to do is deliver your message to Heault.
Introduction: You are attempting to travel to Leviathan Sanctuary to deliver a message. The people of Brumedor could help you.

Name: The Larcen Tournament
Content: The day of the tournament has arrived. The city is awash with excited crowds heading to the tournament grounds. There, many aristocrats sit in the stands waiting for the common folk to participate in the tournament games.
ResultConclusion: You have won one of the tournament events, which now gives you the right to wear the official clothes of the city.

Name: Metal Bars for Metal Bars
Content: Mily asked you for shipments of metal that she will use to craft oryctus cages.
ResultConclusion:
Once the last shipment of metal has been delivered, Mily shows you some of her previous constructions. 

She is particularly proud of one in particular, a fortified drinking trough prototype.

Name: "Push harder!"
Content:
An imposing metal button is embedded in the wall. By pressing lightly upon it, you gain the impression that the gangway is quietly, slowly lowering.

You realize, however, that you will need to use a great deal of force to fully engage the button and lower the gangway to its lowest level.

Name: The passage of the Lithofortress
Content: Arriving in front of the fortress, you look for a way to find out if a passage really exists. You also notice that a peculiar smell emanates from the cave.
Introduction: Sorka asked you to investigate the possibility that there is a secret passage in the Lithofortress leading to the Tarzakon Swamp.
ResultConclusion: You understand that the lady of the waters you freed can transport you from the waters near the throne of Gularzob.

Name: Scabonzi Scouts Upon the Plain
Content: Lyma Sangretti at Silence Camp asked you to kill scabonzi scouts in order to further secure the plain.
Introduction: Scabonzi scouts patrol the Silent Plain.

Name: The Abandoned Cabin
Content: An old cabin sinks slowly but surely into the swamp. Perhaps you could take a look?

Name: Where the vision will take us
Content: Here, you recognize the cave with the two totems that you saw in your vision. Two yellowish silus guard the entrance.
Introduction: Now you know where to go. The end of this investigation is approaching!

Name: The suspension bridge
Content: The bridge is going to need some repairs before it can be crossed.
ResultConclusion: With your repairs, you are certain that the bridge will survive another thousand years.

Name: The Birth of the Nuertogolems
Content: You have finally arrived in the marshy forest. You should now explore it, searching for clues about the animated trees.
Introduction: Suddenly, it comes back to your mind (with a vengeance) that you were coming here to investigate the presence of animated nuertesilicio trees in Wellnear's Fairy Forest.
ResultConclusion:
From what you're able to piece together in the forest, the creatures were created here before crossing the swamp into Viperin Territory.

Sadly, there are no clues as to who could have performed such a ritual.

Name: Sacred Sceptres
Content: You are studying the creation of sceptres with those of the Circle of the Great Tree. Not surprisingly, these studies include an impressive number of sacred rituals.
Introduction: Sceptre rituals must be performed on Knight Hills.

Name: Telluric Pendants
Content: Fiola believes the place is the ideal location to introduce you to "magical" jewellery making. You are in doubt about the properties of gems, but you have little to lose.
Introduction: According to your information, the Stricken Tree should be in the vicinity.
ResultConclusion: Perhaps against your best instincts, you start to believe in Fiola after your training. It might just be in your head, but you seem to feel the power of the crystals.
